protein.specific_function: Cleaves the GlcNAc-Asn bond which joins oligosaccharides to the peptide of asparagine-linked glycoproteins.

reference.reference_text: Fisher KJ, Tollersrud OK, Aronson NN Jr: Cloning and sequence analysis of a cDNA for human glycosylasparaginase. A single gene encodes the subunits of this lysosomal amidase. FEBS Lett. 1990 Sep 3;269(2):440-4.
